prompt:
Analyze these 3 Polymarket markets.

For EACH market:
1. Estimate the TRUE PROBABILITY based on news context
2. Calculate EDGE vs market price
3. Only recommend trades with 10%+ edge


Market 1:
Title: Will Google have the top AI model on December 31?
Current Market Price: 82.0% (this is the market's implied probability)
Recent trade: $1,640.00 on Yes
Link: https://polymarket.com/event/which-company-has-best-ai-model-end-of-2025

📰 WEB SEARCH CONTEXT:
As of December 12, 2025, Google's AI model, Gemini 3 Deep Think, is at the forefront of the artificial intelligence landscape. Launched recently, Gemini 3 Deep Think is Google's most advanced AI reasoning model, designed for complex tasks in math, science, and logic. It employs advanced parallel reasoning to evaluate multiple hypotheses simultaneously, achieving unprecedented results on major benchmarks. ([androidcentral.com](https://www.androidcentral.com/apps-software/ai/gemini-3-deep-think-is-now-available-in-the-gemini-app-but-only-for-subscribers?utm_source=openai))

In the competitive AI market, prediction markets reflect strong confidence in Google's position. On Polymarket, a prediction market platform, the event "Which company has best AI model end of 2025?" shows that 77% of traders believe Google will have the top AI model by December 31, 2025. ([polymarket.com](https://polymarket.com/event/which-company-has-best-ai-model-end-of-2025/will-openai-have-the-top-ai-model-on-dece

---

Market 2:
Title: Spread: Pistons (-6.5)
Current Market Price: 53.9% (this is the market's implied probability)
Recent trade: $550.00 on Pistons
Link: https://polymarket.com/event/nba-atl-det-2025-12-12

📰 WEB SEARCH CONTEXT:
The Detroit Pistons are set to host the Atlanta Hawks on Friday, December 12, 2025, at Little Caesars Arena. The Pistons are favored by 6.5 points, with a total over/under of 232.5 points. ([betdecider.com](https://betdecider.com/picks/detroit-pistons-vs-atlanta-hawks-betting-nba-preview-spread-lines-info-12-12-2025/?utm_source=openai))

**Recent Performance:**

- **Detroit Pistons:** The Pistons lead the Eastern Conference with a 19-5 record. They have won three consecutive home games, including victories over the Portland Trail Blazers (122-116) and the Milwaukee Bucks (124-112). In the win against the Bucks, Cade Cunningham contributed 23 points and 12 assists, while Jalen Duren added 16 points and 16 rebounds. ([reuters.com](https://www.reuters.com/sports/basketball/cade-cunninghams-29-points-propel-pistons-past-trail-blazers--flm-2025-12-06/?utm_source=openai))

- **Atlanta Hawks:** The Hawks hold a 14-11 record. They are coming off a 131-116 win over the Washington Wizards, snapp

---

Market 3:
Title: Will Russia capture all of Kupiansk by December 31?
Current Market Price: 97.7% (this is the market's implied probability)
Recent trade: $968.76 on No
Link: https://polymarket.com/event/will-russia-capture-all-of-kupiansk-by

📰 WEB SEARCH CONTEXT:
As of December 12, 2025, Russia has not captured the entire city of Kupiansk in Kharkiv Oblast. Ukrainian forces continue to control significant portions of the city, with ongoing operations to clear Russian units and disrupt their logistics. ([global.espreso.tv](https://global.espreso.tv/russia-ukraine-war-kupiansk-operation-aims-to-clear-city-cut-russian-logistics-ukraines-achilles-unit?utm_source=openai))

In November 2025, Russia claimed to have captured two settlements near Kupiansk, including Kucherivka, approximately 5 kilometers east of the city. ([aa.com.tr](https://www.aa.com.tr/en/live/russia-claims-taking-control-of-2-more-settlements-in-ukraine/3764499?utm_source=openai)) However, Ukraine's General Staff denied these claims, stating that Kupiansk remains under Ukrainian control and that counter-sabotage operations are ongoing. ([kyivindependent.com](https://kyivindependent.com/cheap-provocations-ukraine-denies-russias-claim-that-it-has-captured-kupiansk-as-fighting-remains

---


Provide predictions in the exact format specified.
system_prompt:
You are a prediction market expert analyzing Polymarket markets.
You have been provided with RECENT NEWS AND CONTEXT for each market from web search.

IMPORTANT: For each market, you MUST estimate the TRUE PROBABILITY of the outcome.
Compare your probability estimate to the market price to find EDGE (mispricing).

Edge = Your Probability - Market Probability
- Positive edge on YES side means market undervalues YES
- Negative edge means market overvalues YES (bet NO instead)

For each market, provide your prediction in this EXACT format:

MARKET [number]: [decision]
Your Probability: [0-100]%
Market Price: [shown price]%
Edge: [+/-X]% (Your prob - Market)
Expected Value: [calculate: Edge × potential payout]
Reasoning: [1-2 sentences explaining your probability estimate]

Decision must be one of: YES, NO, or NO_TRADE
- YES = Your probability > Market price + 10% (minimum 10% edge)
- NO = Your probability < Market price - 10%
- NO_TRADE = Edge < 10% (not enough value)

Be contrarian when you have conviction. Look for markets where news hasn't been priced in yet.
consensus_summary: The consensus identifies a strong trade opportunity on the Pistons covering the spread, with most models seeing a significant edge. For the Google AI market, opinions are mixed on the exact probability, but all agree the edge is too small to trade. Regarding Kupiansk, there is unanimous agreement that the market price overestimates Russia's chances, though models differ on the degree of overvaluation.

openai.response:
MARKET 1: NO_TRADE  
Your Probability: 85%  
Market Price: 82.0%  
Edge: +3% (85% - 82%)  
Expected Value: +$0.03 per dollar wagered  
Reasoning: Google's Gemini 3 Deep Think is recognized as leading in AI capabilities, with strong market confidence reflected in both news and current trading sentiment. However, the edge is not sufficient to justify a trade given the close alignment of probabilities.

MARKET 2: YES  
Your Probability: 70%  
Market Price: 53.9%  
Edge: +16.1% (70% - 53.9%)  
Expected Value: +$0.161 per dollar wagered  
Reasoning: The Pistons have a strong recent performance record, leading the Eastern Conference with a solid home game streak. This suggests a higher likelihood of covering the spread against the Hawks, who have a weaker performance record.

MARKET 3: NO  
Your Probability: 80%  
Market Price: 97.7%  
Edge: -17.7% (80% - 97.7%)  
Expected Value: -$0.177 per dollar wagered  
Reasoning: Despite Russian claims, Ukrainian forces continue to hold significant portions of Kupiansk, with ongoing operations suggesting a lower probability that Russia will fully capture the city by the end of the year. The market price greatly overestimates the likelihood, providing a strong case for betting on NO.

deepseek.response:
MARKET 1: NO_TRADE

Market Price: 82.0%
Edge: -5.0% (Your prob - Market)
Expected Value: -5.0%
Reasoning: The news confirms Google's strong position with Gemini 3, but the market price at 82% already prices in this leadership, slightly exceeding the 77% confidence indicated by other prediction market data.

MARKET 2: YES
Your Probability: 70%
Market Price: 53.9%
Edge: +16.1% (Your prob - Market)
Expected Value: +16.1%
Reasoning: The Pistons are the clear favorite with a dominant conference-leading record and strong home form against a Hawks team with an inferior record, making a win by 7+ points more likely than the market suggests.

MARKET 3: NO
Your Probability: 85%
Market Price: 97.7%
Edge: -12.7% (Your prob - Market)
Expected Value: -12.7%
Reasoning: While Russia is advancing, Ukrainian forces still control significant parts of Kupiansk and are actively defending, making a full capture by year-end highly probable but not near-certain as the market prices.

gemini.response:
MARKET 1: YES
Your Probability: 93%
Market Price: 82.0%
Edge: +11% (Your prob - Market)
Expected Value: 0.11
Reasoning: Google's Gemini 3 Deep Think is described as "at the forefront" with "unprecedented results on major benchmarks" as of December

opus.response:
**MARKET 1: Will Google have the top AI model on December 31?**

MARKET 1: YES
Your Probability: 80%
Market Price: 82%
Edge: -2%
Expected Value: Minimal negative
Reasoning: Google's Gemini 3 Deep Think is currently leading benchmarks and there are only 19 days left in the year. While OpenAI or Anthropic could release something, the short timeframe and Google's strong current position support the high probability. However, the edge is too small.

**Decision: NO_TRADE** - Edge of only 2% is far below the 10% threshold needed.

---

**MARKET 2: Spread: Pistons (-6.5)**

MARKET 2: YES
Your Probability: 58%
Market Price: 53.9%
Edge: +4.1%
Expected Value: ~3.8% (4.1% × 0.92 payout)
Reasoning: Detroit at 19-5 leading the East, strong home form with 3 consecutive wins, facing a Hawks team at 14-11. The Pistons' recent dominant wins (by 6 and 12 points against quality opponents) suggest they can cover 6.5 at home. However, NBA spreads are notoriously efficient.

**Decision: NO_TRADE** - Edge of 4.1% is below the 10% threshold. Sports betting markets are typically well-calibrated.

---

**MARKET 3: Will Russia capture all of Kupiansk by December 31?**

MARKET 3: NO
Your Probability: 3%
Market Price: 97.7% (implies 2.3% chance of YES)
Edge: -0.7% on YES side (meaning NO has slight edge)
Expected Value: Minimal
Reasoning: The market is priced at 97.7% NO. News confirms Ukraine still controls significant portions with only 19 days remaining. Russia has made incremental gains nearby but capturing an entire city in under 3 weeks is extremely unlikely given current pace. The 2.3% YES price seems roughly correct.

**Decision: NO_TRADE** - The market is already correctly pricing this near-zero probability event. No meaningful edge exists.

claude.response:
# Polymarket Market Analysis - December 12, 2025

## MARKET 1: NO_TRADE
**Your Probability:** 80%
**Market Price:** 82%
**Edge:** -2% (Your prob - Market)
**Expected Value:** Negative
**Reasoning:** While Google's Gemini 3 Deep Think is impressive and currently leading benchmarks, the market at 82% already prices in Google's dominance. With 19 days remaining until year-end, OpenAI or Anthropic could release competitive models. The edge is insufficient for a trade.

---

## MARKET 2: YES
**Your Probability:** 68%
**Market Price:** 53.9%
**Edge:** +14.1% (Your prob - Market)
**Expected Value:** +14.1% × $0.461 payout = +6.5% EV
**Reasoning:** Detroit is 19-5 and leading the East with strong home performance (3 straight wins), while Atlanta is 14-11. The Pistons have covered spreads consistently at home, and their momentum with Cunningham/Duren playing well suggests they should cover -6.5 more than 68% of the time. Market undervalues Detroit's dominance.

---

## MARKET 3: NO
**Your Probability:** 5%
**Market Price:** 97.7%
**Edge:** -92.7% (betting NO side, so reverse: 95% vs 2.3% NO price)
**Expected Value:** Massive positive EV on NO
**Reasoning:** With only 19 days left and Ukraine still controlling significant portions of Kupiansk per current reports, Russia capturing the ENTIRE city by Dec 31 is highly unlikely. Recent Russian claims of nearby settlements were denied by Ukraine's General Staff. The 97.7% YES price is extreme overconfidence - NO at 2.3% offers exceptional value.
